answers.text:
Hi Patricia, 
Thank you for your question about trademarks. Here is a previously asked question about local government trademarked logos. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/21295
I hope you find this resource useful! 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern

author: Patricia Himelberger
text: We've recently received a Trademark for our new brand.  We ordered various beach bags, polo shirts, towels, etc  with the new brand.  We know that our primary purpose is not retail sales.  Has anyone used an RFQ or RFP that asks someone to market our brand through merchandise which may be distributed to the various retail, restaurants & small hotels.
title: RFQ for Town Trademarked Goods
